mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_group (name, avatar, description, owner_id, max_members, member_count) VALUES (#{name}, #{avatar}, #{description}, #{ownerId}, #{maxMembers}, #{memberCount})
mapper.select: SELECT g.* FROM chat_group g INNER JOIN group_member gm ON g.id = gm.group_id WHERE gm.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY g.update_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_group SET member_count = #{count} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE chat_group SET member_count = member_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE chat_group SET member_count = member_count - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND member_count > 0
UPDATE chat_group SET owner_id = #{ownerId} WHERE id = #{id}
